comment: According to the statement in [Lang] p. 129, the set ` ( LSubSp `` M ) ` of all linear combinations of a set of vectors V is a submodule (_generated_ by V) of the module M. The elements of V are called _generators_ of ` ( LSubSp `` M ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 12-Apr-2019.)
